demala dayas porawen saha en.ji.oo. bath balayangen yapena emenma jathyanthara kamitu idiriye danin watena aanduwa eeta erehi wana oonama balayak shunya kirimata mulu ganwena bawa mema siddhiyedi pennum kara thibe.
kwontam widyawata anuwa kalu kuhara, simitha ushnathwayakin yuthu wasthuwak men, hokin kirana wihiduwayi.
pinwantha obata da hakiyawak ath nam mema pudabima wetha bathi sithin piya manina lesa meth sithin arayum karami.

ithin machanla labunu prathichara honda nisa thawath kathawak dannam.

bohoma sthuthiyi agaya kirimata.mama lankadipa paththarayata wath sirikathata wath chithra andinne nam naha.mama inne lankawen epita.mama kalekata issara chithra katha andala thiyanawa.paththarayakata nawakathath liyala thiyanawa.samahara wita oya oya kiyapu paththaraye mama podi kathawakuth andala athi.
sthuthiyi obage komentuwata … 🙂

epamanak nowe. 1983 puli masaye di mema walikada siragedaradi ma nirayuda demala rudawiyan 52denaiku ghathanaya karana ladde da rajaye piris wisin usiganwana lada ewakata sira gathawa siti mewani mewani damarika piris wisini.
mehadi polisiya kiyanne owunta ese kirimata ayithiyak athi bawayi.
